howItWorksLines: Click a gift to view details on the right
Shipping details are sent by email during checkout

middle.outsideBudgetBlurb: These are just a teensy bit outside your approx budgetÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ shown because they're special picks.

right.checkoutIntro: Choose one path below. This page records your intent-to-gift and sends shipping details by email. (No real payment happens on-site.)
whatToExpectLines: You'll enter your name, email, and a short message for the gift card.
Your selection becomes 'Claim pending confirmation' until the couple confirms receipt.
Shipping details are emailed during the flow.
right.pendingBlockLine: This gift is currently pending confirmation.

overlay.title: Gifting details
overlay.giftMessage: Message to include on the gift card
overlay.shippingNote: Shipping details are delivered by email (they are not shown on the site).
rightPaneLines: This captures your intent-to-gift and your gift-card message.
Preferred merchants are listed for convenience.
